KR: 자네, 계시자지? 여신께서 도운 게로군.{nl}광산으로 들어가려면 부베 전초기지로 끌려간 바이도타스라는 청년을 먼저 구해야 하네.{nl}내 꼭 부탁함세.
EN: Aren't you the Revelator? The Goddess must have helped us. {nl} In order to enter the mine, you must save a young man name Vaidotas first. {nl}He was kidnapped to the Vubbe outpost. {nl} Please, I ask for your help.
